title: Total Transparency Unleashed
outcome: Three days after the lottery outrage, a dead man’s switch in the system triggers massive data leaks: every Council meeting, secret BCI modification, and leadership dispute is revealed citywide. Citizens sift through decades of secrets, fueling public outrage and reconciliation. District assemblies judge former leaders and debate keeping, modifying, or abolishing the BCI. Halden’s final recorded proposal—annual personal amnesty—sparks fierce debate and ultimately leads to a referendum on forgiveness as the founding value for Stenograd’s next chapter.

events.description: Citywide screens and feeds are flooded with decades of secret Council logs and private BCI code changes, exposed by Halden’s dead man’s switch.
Neighborhood assemblies meet to debate newly revealed secrets. Former Council members are confronted by citizens, and public votes decide on forgiveness versus punishment.
Heated citywide debates are fueled by the revelation of Halden’s final amnesty proposal, sparking intense discussions on the values that should guide Stenograd’s future.
A binding referendum is held on whether to erase the BCI’s punitive records, enshrine forgiveness, or dismantle the system entirely.
